law.text:
The commission shall set, charge, and collect the following fees:
Examination fee, not to exceed one hundred dollars ($100).
Broker's and sales associate's original license fee, not to exceed thirty dollars ($30).
Broker's and sales associate's renewal fee, not to exceed thirty dollars ($30).
Transfer from one (1) principal broker to another, not to exceed ten dollars ($10).
Certification of status with the commission, ten dollars ($10).
Request for any change, not to exceed ten dollars ($10).
Recovery fund, not to exceed thirty dollars ($30).
Broker's and associate's applicant license criminal record check fee, not to exceed thirty dollars ($30).
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 488, sec. 25, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 448, sec. 25, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982.
